greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of even divisors of sigma(n).
comment: sigma(n) = sum of divisors of n: A000203 (also called sigma_1(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
Index entries for sequences related to sums of divisors
example: a(14) = 56 because sigma(14) = 24 and the sum of the 6 even divisors {2, 4, 6, 8, 12, 24} is 56.
results.author: _Michel Lagneau_, Jul 23 2011
